actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation

official_title: To convey certain property to the State of Wyoming to consolidate the historic Ranch A, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ranch A Consolidation and Management Improvement Act

summary.text: Ranch A Consolidation and Management Improvement Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA), through the Forest Service, to convey to Wyoming, without consideration and by quitclaim deed, all interest of the United States in approximately 10 acres of National Forest System land located in the Black Hills National Forest in Crook County, Wyoming.

titles.title: Ranch A Consolidation and Management Improvement Act
To convey certain property to the State of Wyoming to consolidate the historic Ranch A, and for other purposes.
